   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_private_message/1,
   36:          muc_deny_private_room_access/1,
   37:          muc_allow_access_to_owner/1,
   38:          muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms/1,
   39:          muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms/1,
   40:          range_archive_request/1,
   41:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   42:          limit_archive_request/1,
   43:          prefs_set_request/1,
   44:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   45:          pagination_first5/1,
   46:          pagination_last5/1,
   47:          pagination_before10/1,
   48:          pagination_after10/1,
   49:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   50:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   51:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   52:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   53:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   54:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   55:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   56:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   57:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   58:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   59:          archived/1,
   60:          strip_archived/1,
   61:          filter_forwarded/1,
   62:          policy_violation/1,
   63:          offline_message/1,
   64:          nostore_hint/1,
   65:          purge_single_message/1,
   66:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   67:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   68:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   69:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   70:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   71:          run_prefs_cases/1,
   72:          run_set_and_get_prefs_cases/1]).
   73: 
   74: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   75: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   76: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   77: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   78: 
   79: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   80:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   81:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   82:     )).
   83: 
   84: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   85:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   86:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   87:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   88:     )).
   89: 
   90: -define(_assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   91:     [ct:pal("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   92:             [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   93:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   94:     )).
   95: 
   96: -record(rsm_in, {
   97:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   98:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   99:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
  100:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  101:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
  102:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
  103:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
  104:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
  105:         simple = false :: boolean(),
  106:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
  107:         }).
  108: 
  109: -record(forwarded_message, {
  110:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
  111:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
  112:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
  113:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
  114:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
  115:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
  116:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
  117:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  118:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined,
  119:     has_x_user_element :: boolean()
  120: }).
  121: 
  122: -record(result_iq, {
  123:     from            :: binary(),
  124:     to              :: binary(),
  125:     id              :: binary(),
  126:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  127:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  128:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  129:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  130: }).
  131: 
  132: -record(error_iq, {
  133:     id              :: binary(),
  134:     type            :: binary(),
  135:     error_type      :: binary(),
  136:     condition       :: binary(),
  137:     text            :: binary()
  138: }).
  139: 
  140: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  141:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  142:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  143:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  144: }).
  145: 
  146: 
  147: -record(mam_archive_respond, {
  148:           respond_messages,
  149:           respond_iq,
  150:           respond_fin
  151:          }).
  152: 
  153: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  154: %% Suite configuration
  155: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  156: 
  157: muc_host() ->
  158:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  159: 
  160: host() ->
  161:     <<"localhost">>.
  162: 
  163: configurations() ->
  164:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  165:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  166: 
  167: odbc_configs(true) ->
  168:     [odbc,
  169:      odbc_simple,
  170:      odbc_async_pool,
  171:      odbc_mnesia,
  172:      odbc_async_cache,
  173:      odbc_cache,
  174:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  175:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  176: odbc_configs(_) ->
  177:     [].
  178: 
  179: riak_configs(true) ->
  180:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  181: riak_configs(_) ->
  182:      [].
  183: 
  184: basic_group_names() ->
  185:     [
  186:     mam,
  187:     mam03,
  188:     mam04,
  189:     mam_purge,
  190:     muc,
  191:     muc03,
  192:     muc04,
  193:     muc_with_pm,
  194:     rsm,
  195:     rsm03,
  196:     rsm04,
  197:     with_rsm,
  198:     with_rsm03,
  199:     with_rsm04,
  200:     muc_rsm,
  201:     muc_rsm03,
  202:     muc_rsm04,
  203:     bootstrapped,
  204:     archived,
  205:     policy_violation,
  206:     nostore,
  207:     prefs_cases
  208:     ].
  209: 
  210: all() ->
  211:     Reasons =
  212:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  213:         false -> [require_odbc];
  214:         true  -> []
  215:     end,
  216:     case Reasons of
  217:         [] ->
  218:             tests();
  219:         [_|_] ->
  220:             {skip, Reasons}
  221:     end.
  222: 
  223: tests() ->
  224:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  225:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  226:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  227: 
  228: groups() ->
  229:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  230:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  231:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  232: 
  233: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  234:     false.
  235: 
  236: 
  237: basic_groups() ->
  238:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  239:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  240:      {mam03,            [], mam_cases()},
  241:      {mam04,            [], mam_cases()},
  242:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  243:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  244:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  245:      {nostore,          [], nostore_cases()},
  246:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  247:      {muc03,            [], muc_cases()},
  248:      {muc04,            [], muc_cases()},
  249:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  250:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  251:      {rsm03,            [], rsm_cases()},
  252:      {rsm04,            [], rsm_cases()},
  253:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  254:      {muc_rsm03,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  255:      {muc_rsm04,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  256:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()},
  257:      {with_rsm03,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  258:      {with_rsm04,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  259:      {prefs_cases,      [], prefs_cases()}].
  260: 
  261: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  262:      [purge_old_single_message,
  263:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  264: 
  265: mam_cases() ->
  266:     [mam_service_discovery,
  267:      simple_archive_request,
  268:      range_archive_request,
  269:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  270:      limit_archive_request].
  271: 
  272: mam_purge_cases() ->
  273:     [purge_single_message,
  274:      purge_multiple_messages].
  275: 
  276: archived_cases() ->
  277:     [archived,
  278:      strip_archived,
  279:      filter_forwarded].
  280: 
  281: policy_violation_cases() ->
  282:     [policy_violation].
  283: 
  284: nostore_cases() ->
  285:     [offline_message,
  286:      nostore_hint].
  287: 
  288: muc_cases() ->
  289:     [muc_service_discovery,
  290:      muc_archive_request,
  291:      muc_archive_purge,
  292:      muc_multiple_devices,
  293:      muc_private_message,
  294:      muc_deny_private_room_access,
  295:      muc_allow_access_to_owner,
  296:      muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms,
  297:      muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms,
  298:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  299:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  300:      ].
  301: 
  302: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  303:     rsm_cases().
  304: 
  305: with_rsm_cases() ->
  306:     rsm_cases().
  307: 
  308: rsm_cases() ->
  309:       [pagination_first5,
  310:        pagination_last5,
  311:        pagination_before10,
  312:        pagination_after10,
  313:        pagination_empty_rset,
  314:        %% Border cases
  315:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  316:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  317:        %% Simple cases
  318:        pagination_simple_before10,
  319:        %% opt_count cases
  320:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  321:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  322:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  323:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  324:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  325:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  326:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  327: 
  328: prefs_cases() ->
  329:     [prefs_set_request,
  330:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  331:      run_prefs_cases,
  332:      run_set_and_get_prefs_cases].
  333: 
  334: suite() ->
  335:     escalus:suite().
  336: 
  337: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  338:     disable_shaping(
  339:       delete_users([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  340:                   | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)])).
  341: 
  342: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  343:     escalus:end_per_suite(restore_shaping(Config)).
  344: 
  345: user_names() ->
  346:     [alice, bob, kate].
  347: 
  348: create_users(Config) ->
  349:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  350: 
  351: delete_users(Config) ->
  352:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}),
  353:     Config.
  354: 
  355: disable_shaping(Config) ->
  356:     OldShaper = get_shaper(),
  357:     set_shaper({{maxrate, 100}, {maxrate, 10000000}, {maxrate, 10000000}}),
  358:     [{old_mam_shaper, OldShaper}|Config].
  359: 
  360: restore_shaping(Config) ->
  361:     OldShaper = proplists:get_value(old_mam_shaper, Config),
  362:     set_shaper(OldShaper),
  363:     Config.
  364: 
  365: get_shaper() ->
  366:     Mam = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}]),
  367:     Norm = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}]),
  368:     Fast = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}]),
  369:     {Mam, Norm, Fast}.
  370: 
  371: set_shaper({Mam, Norm, Fast}) ->
  372:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}, Mam]),
  373:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}, Norm]),
  374:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}, Fast]),
  375:     rpc_apply(shaper_srv, reset_all_shapers, [host()]).
  376: 
  377: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  378:    C = configuration(Group),
  379:    B = basic_group(Group),
  380:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  381:         skip ->
  382:             {skip, print_configuration_not_supported(C, B)};
  383:         Config0 ->
  384:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  385:                    [Group, C, B]),
  386:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  387:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  388:     end.
  389: 
  390: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  391:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  392:     case C of
  393:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  394:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  395:         _ ->
  396:             Config0
  397:     end.
  398: 
  399: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  400:     delete_users(Config),
  401:     C = configuration(Group),
  402:     B = basic_group(Group),
  403:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  404: 
  405: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  406:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  407: init_modules(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  408:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  409: init_modules(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  410:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  411: 
  412: init_modules(C, muc03, Config) ->
  413:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  414: init_modules(C, muc04, Config) ->
  415:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  416: 
  417: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  418:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  419:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  420:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  421:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  422:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  423:     Config;
  424: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  425:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  426:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  427:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  428:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  429:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  430:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  431:     Config;
  432: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  433:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm, simple]),
  434:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  435:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  436:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  437:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  438:     Config;
  439: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  440:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  441:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  442:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  443:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]),
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  445:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  446:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  447:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  448:     Config;
  449: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  450:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  451:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  452:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  453:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  454:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  455:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  456:     Config;
  457: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  458:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  459:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  460:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  461:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  462:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  463:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  464:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  465:     Config;
  466: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  467:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  468:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  469:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]),
  471:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  472:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  473:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  474:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  475:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  476:     Config;
  477: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  478:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  479:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  480:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  481:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  484:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  485:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  486:     Config;
  487: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  490:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  491:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  492:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  493:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  494:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  495:     Config;
  496: 
  497: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  498:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  499:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  500:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  501:     Config;
  502: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  503:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  504:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  505:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  506:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  507:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  508:     Config;
  509: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc, Config) ->
  510:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [muc, simple]),
  511:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  512:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  513:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  514:     Config;
  515: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  516:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  517:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  518:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  519:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  520:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  521:     Config;
  522: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  523:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  524:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  525:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  526:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  527:     Config;
  528: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  529:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  530:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  531:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  532:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  533:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  534:     Config;
  535: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  536:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  537:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, [{flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  538:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  539:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  540:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  541:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  542:     Config;
  543: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  544:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  545:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  546:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  547:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  548:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  549:     Config;
  550: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  551:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  552:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  553:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  554:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  555:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  556:     Config;
  557: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  558:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  559:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  560:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  561:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  562:     Config;

  565:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, simple]),
  566:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  567:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  568:     Config;
  569: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  570:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  571:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  572:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  573:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  574:     Config;

  577:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  578:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), % 1ms
  579:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  580:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  581:     Config;
  582: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->

  584:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm, muc]),
  585:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  586:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}, add_archived_element]),
  587:     Config;
  588: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  589:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  590:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  591:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm, {flush_interval, 1}]), %% 1ms
  592:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  593:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  594:     Config;
  595: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  596:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, [add_archived_element]),
  597:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  598:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  599:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  600:     Config;

  605:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  606:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  607:     Config;

  616: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->

  620:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),

  622:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  623:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  624:     Config.
  625: 
  626: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  627:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  628:     Config.
  629: 
  630: mam_modules() ->
  631:     [mod_mam,
  632:      mod_mam_muc,
  633:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  634:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  635:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  636:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  637:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  638:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  639:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  640:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  641:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  642:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  643:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  644:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  645:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  646:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  647: 
  648: init_state(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  649:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  650:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  651: init_state(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  652:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  653:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  654: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  655:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  656:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  657:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  658:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  659: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  660:     Config;
  661: init_state(_, muc03, Config) ->
  662:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  663: init_state(_, muc04, Config) ->
  664:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  665: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  666:     Config;
  667: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  668:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  669: init_state(_, rsm03, Config) ->
  670:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  671:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  672: init_state(_, rsm04, Config) ->
  673:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  674:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  675: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  676:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  677:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  678: init_state(_, with_rsm03, Config) ->
  679:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  680:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  681: init_state(_, with_rsm04, Config) ->
  682:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  683:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  684: init_state(_, run_prefs_cases, Config) ->
  685:     clean_archives(Config);
  686: init_state(_, mam03, Config) ->
  687:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  688:     clean_archives(Config1);
  689: init_state(_, mam04, Config) ->
  690:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  691:     clean_archives(Config1);
  692: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  693:     clean_archives(Config).
  694: 
  695: mam03_props() ->
  696:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  697:      {final_message, true},             %% expect final message with <fin/> inside
  698:      {result_format, mess_fin},         %% RSM is inside final message
  699:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v03()}].    %% v0.3 namespace
  700: 
  701: mam04_props() ->
  702:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  703:      {result_format, iq_fin},           %% RSM is inside iq with <fin/> inside
  704:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v04()}].
  705: 
  706: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  707:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  708:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  709:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  710:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  711:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  712:                                        ],
  713:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  714:                  _ ->
  715:                      ConfigIn
  716:              end,
  717:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  718: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  719:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  720: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  721:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  722: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  723:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  724: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  725:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  726: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  727:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  728:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  729: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  730:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  731:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  732: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  733:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  734:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  735: init_per_testcase(C=nostore_hint, Config) ->
  736:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config); %% skip bootstrap & clean to safe time
  737: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  738:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  739:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  740: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  741:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  742:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  743: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  744:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  745: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  746:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  747: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  748:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  749: init_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  750:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  751: init_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_private_room_access, Config) ->
  752:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_private_room(Config));
  753: init_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  754:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_private_room(Config));
  755: init_per_testcase(C=muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  756:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_anonymous_room(Config));
  757: init_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  758:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_anonymous_room(Config));
  759: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  760:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  761:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  762: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  763:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  764: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  765:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  766: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  767:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  768: 
  769: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  770:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  771:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  772:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  773:         _ ->
  774:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  775:     end.
  776: 
  777: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  778:     destroy_room(Config),
  779:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  780: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  781:     destroy_room(Config),
  782:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  783: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  784:     destroy_room(Config),
  785:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  786: end_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  787:     destroy_room(Config),
  788:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  789: end_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_private_room_access, Config) ->
  790:     destroy_room(Config),
  791:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  792: end_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  793:     destroy_room(Config),
  794:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  795: end_per_testcase(C=muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  796:     destroy_room(Config),
  797:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  798: end_per_testcase(C=muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms, Config) ->
  799:     destroy_room(Config),
  800:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  801: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  802:     destroy_room(Config),
  803:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  804: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  805:     destroy_room(Config),
  806:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  807: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  808:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  809: 
  810: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  811:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  812:     orelse
  813:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  814:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  815:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  816: 
  817: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  818:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  819: 
  820: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  821:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  822: 
  823: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  824:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  825:         non_existing -> ok;
  826:         false        -> ok;
  827:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  828:     end.
  829: 
  830: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  831:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  832:     ok.
  833: 
  834: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  835:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  836:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  837:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  838:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  839:     Result ->
  840:         Result
  841:     end.
  842: 
  843: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  844:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  845:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  846:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  847: 
  848: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  849: %% Group name helpers
  850: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  851: 
  852: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  853:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  854: 
  855: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  856: configuration(Group) ->
  857:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  858: 
  859: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  860: %% will be tested.
  861: %%
  862: %% Example:
  863: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  864: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  865: %% @end
  866: make_greedy(List) ->
  867:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  868: 
  869: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  870: basic_group(Group) ->
  871:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  872: 
  873: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  874:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  875:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  876:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  877: 
  878: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  879:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  880: 
  881: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  882:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  883:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  884:         true -> PrefixA;
  885:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  886:     end.
  887: 
  888: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  889:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  890: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  891:     Target.
  892: 
  893: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  894:     Tail.
  895: 
  896: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  897: %% Adhoc tests
  898: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  899: 
  900: %% Querying the archive for messages
  901: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  902:     P = ?config(props, ConfigIn),
  903:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  904:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  905:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  906:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  907:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  908:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  909:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  910:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  911:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  912:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  913:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
  914:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  915:         ok
  916:         end,
  917:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  918:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  919:                       ],
  920:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  921:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  922: 
  923: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  924:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  925:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  926:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  927:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  928: 
  929:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  930: 
  931:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  932:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID)),
  933:         assert_respond_size(P, CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  934:         ok
  935:         end,
  936:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  937: 
  938: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  939:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  940:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  941:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  942:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  943: 
  944:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  945: 
  946:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(P, <<>>),
  947:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  948:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  949:         assert_respond_size(P, MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  950: 
  951:         ok
  952:         end,
  953:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  954: 
  955: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  956:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  957:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  958:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  959:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  960: 
  961:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  962:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  963:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  964: 
  965:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID),
  966:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  967:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
  968: 
  969:         assert_respond_size(P, Len, Result),
  970:         ok
  971:         end,
  972:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  973: 
  974: archived(Config) ->
  975:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  976:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  977:         %% Archive must be empty.
  978:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  979:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  980: 
  981:         %% Bob receives a message.
  982:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  983:         try
  984:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  985:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  986:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  987:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  988:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  989: 
  990:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
  991: 
  992:         %% Bob calls archive.
  993:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  994:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
  995:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
  996:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  997:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
  998:         ok
  999:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1000:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1001:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
 1002:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1003:         end
 1004:         end,
 1005:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1006: 
 1007: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
 1008:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1009:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1010:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
 1011:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1012: 
 1013:         %% Bob receives a message.
 1014:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1015:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1016:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1017:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1018: 
 1019:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
 1020:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1021:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1022:         ok
 1023:         end,
 1024:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1025: 
 1026: strip_archived(Config) ->
 1027:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1028:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1029:         %% Archive must be empty.
 1030:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
 1031:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1032:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
 1033:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1034:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
 1035: 
 1036:         %% Bob receives a message.
 1037:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1038:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1039:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1040:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1041:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1042:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1043: 
 1044:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
 1045: 
 1046:         try
 1047:         %% Bob calls archive.
 1048:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1049:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1050:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1051:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1052:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1053:         ok
 1054:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1055:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1056:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
 1057:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1058:         end
 1059:         end,
 1060:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1061: 
 1062: respond_messages(#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1063:     Messages.
 1064: 
 1065: respond_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ}) ->
 1066:     IQ.
 1067: 
 1068: get_prop(Key, undefined) ->
 1069:     get_prop(Key, []);
 1070: get_prop(final_message, P) ->
 1071:     proplists:get_bool(final_message, P);
 1072: get_prop(result_format, P) ->
 1073:     proplists:get_value(result_format, P, iq_query);
 1074: get_prop(mam_ns, P) ->
 1075:     proplists:get_value(mam_ns, P, mam_ns_binary());
 1076: get_prop(data_form, P) ->
 1077:     proplists:get_bool(data_form, P).
 1078: 
 1079: wait_archive_respond(P, User) ->
 1080:     case get_prop(final_message, P) of
 1081:         true ->
 1082:             wait_archive_respond_fin(User);
 1083:         false ->
 1084:             wait_archive_respond_nofin(User)
 1085:     end.
 1086: 
 1087: wait_archive_respond_fin(User) ->
 1088:     %% rot1
 1089:     [IQ|MessagesAndFin] = wait_archive_respond_v03(User),
 1090:     [Fin|Messages] = lists:reverse(MessagesAndFin),
 1091:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1092:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1093:        respond_fin=Fin,
 1094:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1095: 
 1096: wait_archive_respond_nofin(User) ->
 1097:     %% rot1
 1098:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond_v02(User)),
 1099:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1100:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1101:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1102: 
 1103: %% MAM v0.2 respond
 1104: wait_archive_respond_v02(User) ->
 1105:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1106:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
 1107:         true ->
 1108:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
 1109:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1110:         false -> ok
 1111:     end,
 1112:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
 1113:         true  -> [S];
 1114:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond_v02(User)]
 1115:     end.
 1116: 
 1117: %% MAM v0.3 respond
 1118: wait_archive_respond_v03(User) ->
 1119:     IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1120:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(IQ) of
 1121:         true ->
 1122:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [IQ]),
 1123:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1124:         false -> ok
 1125:     end,
 1126:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1127:     [IQ|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)].
 1128: 
 1129: wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User) ->
 1130:     M = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1131:     escalus:assert(is_message, M),
 1132:     case is_final_message(M) of
 1133:         true ->
 1134:             [M];
 1135:         false ->
 1136:             [M|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)]
 1137:     end.
 1138: 
 1139: is_final_message(M) ->
 1140:     undefined =/= exml_query:subelement(M, <<"fin">>).
 1141: 
 1142: assert_respond_size(P, Size, Respond=#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages})
 1143:       when length(Messages) =:= Size ->
 1144:     Respond;
 1145: assert_respond_size(P, ExpectedSize, #mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1146:     RespondSize = length(Messages) - 1,
 1147:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
 1148:     %% void()
 1149: 
 1150: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
 1151: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
 1152: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
 1153: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
 1154: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
 1155: policy_violation(Config) ->
 1156:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1157:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1158:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1159:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
 1160:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 1161:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1162:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
 1163:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
 1164:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
 1165:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1166:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
 1167:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"will_fail">>)),
 1168:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1169:         try
 1170:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
 1171:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
 1172:             ok
 1173:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1174:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1175:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
 1176:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1177:         end
 1178:         end,
 1179:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1180: 
 1181: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
 1182: offline_message(Config) ->
 1183:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
 1184:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1185:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1186:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
 1187:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1188:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
 1189:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1190:         ok
 1191:         end,
 1192:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
 1193: 
 1194:     %% Bob logs in
 1195:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
 1196: 
 1197:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
 1198:     %% will be delivered automatically.
 1199: 
 1200:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
 1201:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
 1202: 
 1203:     %% Bob checks his archive.
 1204:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1205:     ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1206:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1207: 
 1208:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
 1209: 
 1210: nostore_hint(Config) ->
 1211:     Msg = <<"So secret">>,
 1212:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1213:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1214:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob with a hint.
 1215:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1216:                      add_nostore_hint(escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg))),
 1217:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1218:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 1000),
 1219: 
 1220:         %% Bob checks his archive.
 1221:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1222:         ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1223:         assert_not_stored(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1224:         ok
 1225:         end,
 1226:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1227: 
 1228: purge_single_message(Config) ->
 1229:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1230:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1231:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1232:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1233:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1234:             [Mess] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1235:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
 1236:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1237:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1238:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1239:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1240:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1241:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1242:             ok
 1243:         end,
 1244:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1245: 
 1246: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
 1247:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1248:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1249:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1250:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1251:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
 1252:             AllMessages = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize,
 1253:                 wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1254:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 1255:             %% Delete fifth message.
 1256:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
 1257:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1258:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1259:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1260:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1261:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1262:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1263:             assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1264:             ok
 1265:         end,
 1266:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1267: 
 1268: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1269:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1270:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1271:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1272:             [begin
 1273:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1274:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1275:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1276:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1277:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1278:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1279:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1280:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1281:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1282:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1283:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1284:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1285:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1286:             ok
 1287:         end,
 1288:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1289: 
 1290: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1291:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1292:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1293:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1294:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1295:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1296:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1297:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1298: 
 1299:         %% Bob received presences.
 1300:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1301: 
 1302:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1303:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1304: 
 1305:         %% Alice sends another message to Bob.
 1306:         %% The message is not archived by the room.
 1307:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1308:         escalus:assert(is_message, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
 1309: 
 1310:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1311: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1312: 
 1313:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1314:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1315:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1316:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1317:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1318:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1319:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1320:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1321:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1322:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1323: 
 1324:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1325: 
 1326:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1327:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1328:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1329:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1330:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1331:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1332:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1333:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1334:         ?assert_equal_extra(true, has_x_user_element(ArcMsg),
 1335:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1336:         ok
 1337:         end,
 1338:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1339: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1340: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1341:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1342:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1343:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1344:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1345:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1346:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1347:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1348: 
 1349:         %% Bob received presences.
 1350:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1351: 
 1352:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1353:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1354: 
 1355:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1356:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1357: 
 1358:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1359:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1360:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1361:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1362:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1363:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1364:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1365:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1366:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1367:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1368:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1369:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1370:         ok
 1371:     end,
 1372:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1373: 
 1374: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1375:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1376:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1377:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1378:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1379:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1380:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1381:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1382:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1383:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1384: 
 1385:         %% Alice received presences.
 1386:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1387:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1388: 
 1389:         %% Bob received presences.
 1390:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1391: 
 1392:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1393:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1394: 
 1395:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1396:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1397:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1398: 
 1399:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1400: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1401: 
 1402:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1403:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1404:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1405: 
 1406:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1407:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1408: 
 1409:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1410:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1411:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1412: 
 1413:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1414:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1415:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1416:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1417:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1418:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1419:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1420:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1421:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1422:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1423: 
 1424:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1425: 
 1426:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1427: 
 1428:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1429: 
 1430:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1431:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1432:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1433:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1434:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1435:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1436:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1437:         ok
 1438:         end,
 1439:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1440: 
 1441: muc_private_message(Config) ->
 1442:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1443:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1444:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1445:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1446:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1447:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1448: 
 1449:         %% Bob received presences.
 1450:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1451: 
 1452:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1453:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1454: 
 1455:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1456:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1457:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1458:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1459: 
 1460:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1461:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1462:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1463: 
 1464:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1465:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1466:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1467:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1468:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1469:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1470: 
 1471:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1472:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1473:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1474:         ok
 1475:         end,
 1476:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1477: 
 1478: muc_deny_private_room_access(Config) ->
 1479:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1480:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1481:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1482:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1483:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1484:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1485:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1486: 
 1487:         %% mod_muc returns error presence.
 1488:         Err1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1489:         escalus_assert:is_error(Err1, <<"auth">>, <<"not-authorized">>),
 1490: 
 1491:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1492: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1493: 
 1494:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1495:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1496:         Err2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1497:         %% mod_mam_muc returns error iq.
 1498:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Err2),
 1499:         ok
 1500:         end,
 1501:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1502: 
 1503: %% @doc Allow access to non-in-room users who able to connect
 1504: muc_allow_access_to_owner(Config) ->
 1505:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1506:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1507:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1508:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1509: 
 1510:         %% Alice (not in room) requests the room's archive.
 1511:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1512:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1513:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1514:         ok
 1515:         end,
 1516:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1517: 
 1518: muc_delete_x_user_in_anon_rooms(Config) ->
 1519:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1520:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1521:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1522:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1523:         Text = <<"Hi all!">>,
 1524:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1525:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1526: 
 1527:         %% Bob received presences.
 1528:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1529: 
 1530:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1531:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1532: 
 1533:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1534: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1535: 
 1536:         %% Bob receives the message.
 1537:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1538:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1539: 
 1540:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1541: 
 1542:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1543:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1544: 
 1545:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1546:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1547: 
 1548:         ?assert_equal_extra(false, has_x_user_element(ArcMsg),
 1549:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1550:         ok
 1551:         end,
 1552:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1553: 
 1554: muc_show_x_user_to_moderators_in_anon_rooms(Config) ->
 1555:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1556:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1557:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1558:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1559:         Text = <<"Hi all!">>,
 1560:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1561: 
 1562:         %% Alice received presences.
 1563:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1),
 1564: 
 1565:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1566:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1),
 1567: 
 1568:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1569: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1570: 
 1571:         %% Alice receives the message.
 1572:         AliceMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1573:         escalus:assert(is_message, AliceMsg),
 1574: 
 1575:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1576: 
 1577:         %% Alice requests the room's archive.
 1578:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1579: 
 1580:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1581:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1582: 
 1583:         ?assert_equal_extra(true, has_x_user_element(ArcMsg),
 1584:                             [{forwarded_message, ArcMsg}]),
 1585:         ok
 1586:         end,
 1587:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1588: 
 1589: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1590: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1591:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1592:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1593:         %% Send
 1594:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1595:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1596:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1597:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1598:         %%   </query>
 1599:         %% </iq>
 1600:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request(P)),
 1601:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1602:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1603:         ok
 1604:         end,
 1605:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1606: 
 1607: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1608:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1609:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1610:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1611:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1612:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1613:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1614:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1615:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1616:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1617:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1618:         %% Send
 1619:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1620:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1621:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1622:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1623:         %%   </query>
 1624:         %% </iq>
 1625:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, StartTime, StopTime)),
 1626:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1627:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1628:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1629:         [M1,M2|_] = respond_messages(Result),
 1630:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1631:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1632:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1633:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1634:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1635:         ok
 1636:         end,
 1637:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1638: 
 1639: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1640:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1641:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1642:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1643:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1644: 
 1645: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1646: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1647: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1648:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1649:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1650:         %% Send
 1651:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1652:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1653:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1654:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1655:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1656:         %%       </set>
 1657:         %%   </query>
 1658:         %% </iq>
 1659:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request(P)),
 1660:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1661:         Msgs = respond_messages(Result),
 1662:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1663:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1664:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1665:         ok
 1666:         end,
 1667:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1668: 
 1669: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1670:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1671:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1672:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1673:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1674: 
 1675:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1676:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1677:         wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, 15)
 1678:         end,
 1679:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1680: 
 1681: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1682:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1683:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1684:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1685:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1686:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1687:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1688:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 5),
 1689:         ok
 1690:         end,
 1691:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1692: 
 1693: pagination_first5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1694:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1695:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1696:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1697:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1698:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1699:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1700:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 5),
 1701:         ok
 1702:         end,
 1703:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1704: 
 1705: pagination_first25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1706:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1707:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1708:         %% Get the first page of size 25.
 1709:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25},
 1710:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1711:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1712:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 15),
 1713:         ok
 1714:         end,
 1715:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1716: 
 1717: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1718:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1719:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1720:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1721:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 1722:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1723:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5">>, RSM)),
 1724:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 11, 15),
 1725:         ok
 1726:         end,
 1727:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1728: 
 1729: pagination_last5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1730:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1731:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1732:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1733:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1734:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1735:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1736:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 11, 15),
 1737:         ok
 1738:         end,
 1739:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1740: 
 1741: pagination_last25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1742:     P = ?config(props, Config),

 1744:         %% Get the last page of size 25.
 1745:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1746:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1747:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
