 1752: 
 1753: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1754:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1755:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1756:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1757:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1758:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1759:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1760:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 10),
 1761:         ok
 1762:         end,
 1763:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1764: 
 1765: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1766:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1767:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1768:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1769:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1770:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1771:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1772:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 15),
 1773:         ok
 1774:         end,
 1775:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1776: 
 1777: 
 1778: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1779:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1780:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1781:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1782:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1783:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1784:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1785:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 5, 9),
 1786:         ok
 1787:         end,
 1788:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1789: 
 1790: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1791:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1792:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1793:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1794:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config), simple=true},
 1795:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1796:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1797:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1798:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1799:         ok
 1800:         end,
 1801:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1802: 
 1803: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1804:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1805:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1806:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1807:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1808:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1809:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"after10">>, RSM)),
 1810:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 11, 15),
 1811:         ok
 1812:         end,
 1813:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1814: 
 1815: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1816: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1817: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1818:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1819:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1820:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1821:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1822:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1823:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1824:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1825:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1826:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1827:         ok
 1828:         end,
 1829:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1830: 
 1831: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1832: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1833:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1834:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1835:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1836:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1837:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1838:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1839:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1840:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1841:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1842:         ok
 1843:         end,
 1844:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1845: 
 1846: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1847:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1848: 
 1849: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1850:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1851:         true ->
 1852:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1853:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1854:         _ ->
 1855:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1856:     end.
 1857: 
 1858: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1859:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1860:         true ->
 1861:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1862:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1863:         _ ->
 1864:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1865:     end.
 1866: 
 1867: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1868:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1869:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1870:         %% Send
 1871:         %%
 1872:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1873:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1874:         %%     <always>
 1875:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1876:         %%     </always>
 1877:         %%     <never>
 1878:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1879:         %%     </never>
 1880:         %%   </prefs>
 1881:         %% </iq>
 1882:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1883:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1884:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1885:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1886: 
 1887:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1888:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1889: 
 1890:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1891:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1892:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1893:         ok
 1894:         end,
 1895:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1896: 
 1897: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1898: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1899: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1900: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1901: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1902:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1903:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1904:         %% Send
 1905:         %%
 1906:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1907:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1908:         %%     <always>
 1909:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1910:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1911:         %%     </always>
 1912:         %%   </prefs>
 1913:         %% </iq>
 1914:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1915:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1916:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1917:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1918:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1919: 
 1920:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1921:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1922: 
 1923:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1924:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1925:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1926:         ok
 1927:         end,
 1928:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1929: 
 1930: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1931:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1932:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1933:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1934:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1935:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1936:         try
 1937:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1938:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1939:         ok
 1940:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1941:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1942:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1943:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1944:         end
 1945:         end,
 1946:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1947: 
 1948: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 1949: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1950:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1951:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1952:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 1953:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1954:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 1955:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1956:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 1957:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 1958:         ok
 1959:         end,
 1960:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1961: 
 1962: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1963: %% Helpers
 1964: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1965: 
 1966: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 1967: 
 1968: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 1969: mam_ns_binary_v03() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:0">>.
 1970: mam_ns_binary_v04() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:1">>.
 1971: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 1972: 
 1973: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 1974:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1975:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1976:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 1977:     }]).
 1978: 
 1979: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 1980:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1981:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1982:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 1983:        children = skip_undefined([
 1984:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1985:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1986:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 1987:     }]).
 1988: 
 1989: 
 1990: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 1991:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 1992: 
 1993: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 1994:     [];
 1995: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 1996:     [{K, V}].
 1997: 
 1998: mam_ns_attr(P) ->
 1999:     [{<<"xmlns">>,get_prop(mam_ns, P)}].
 2000: 
 2001: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 2002:     undefined;
 2003: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 2004:     #xmlel{
 2005:         name = <<"start">>,
 2006:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 2007: 
 2008: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 2009:     undefined;
 2010: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 2011:     #xmlel{
 2012:         name = <<"end">>,
 2013:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 2014: 
 2015: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 2016:     undefined;
 2017: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 2018:     #xmlel{
 2019:         name = <<"with">>,
 2020:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 2021: 
 2022: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 2023: %% a certain query.
 2024: stanza_archive_request(P, QueryId) ->
 2025:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId,
 2026:                               undefined, undefined,
 2027:                               undefined, undefined).
 2028: 
 2029: stanza_date_range_archive_request(P) ->
 2030:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 2031:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 2032:                               undefined, undefined).
 2033: 
 2034: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, Start, Stop) ->
 2035:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 2036:                               Start, Stop,
 2037:                               undefined, undefined).
 2038: 
 2039: stanza_limit_archive_request(P) ->
 2040:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 2041:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 2042: 
 2043: stanza_page_archive_request(P, QueryId, RSM) ->
 2044:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 2045: 
 2046: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID) ->
 2047:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, undefined,
 2048:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 2049: 
 2050: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2051:     case get_prop(data_form, P) of
 2052:         false ->
 2053:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM);
 2054:         true ->
 2055:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM)
 2056:     end.
 2057: 
 2058: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2059:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2060:        name = <<"query">>,
 2061:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 2062:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId),
 2063:        children = skip_undefined([
 2064:            form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM),
 2065:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 2066:     }]).
 2067: 
 2068: 
 2069: form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2070:     #xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
 2071:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:x:data">>}],
 2072:            children = skip_undefined([
 2073:                 form_field(<<"start">>, BStart),
 2074:                 form_field(<<"end">>, BEnd),
 2075:                 form_field(<<"with">>, BWithJID)]
 2076:                 ++ form_extra_fields(RSM)
 2077:                 ++ form_border_fields(RSM))}.
 2078: 
 2079: form_extra_fields(undefined) ->
 2080:     [];
 2081: form_extra_fields(#rsm_in{simple=Simple, opt_count=OptCount}) ->
 2082:     [form_bool_field(<<"simple">>, Simple),
 2083:      form_bool_field(<<"opt_count">>, OptCount)].
 2084: 
 2085: form_border_fields(undefined) ->
 2086:     [];
 2087: form_border_fields(#rsm_in{
 2088:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 2089:     [form_field(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId),
 2090:      form_field(<<"after_id">>, AfterId),
 2091:      form_field(<<"from_id">>, FromId),
 2092:      form_field(<<"to_id">>, ToId)].
 2093: 
 2094: form_type_field(MamNs) ->
 2095:     form_field(<<"FORM_TYPE">>, MamNs).
 2096: 
 2097: form_field(VarName, undefined) ->
 2098:     undefined;
 2099: form_field(VarName, VarValue) ->
 2100:     #xmlel{name = <<"field">>, attrs = [{<<"var">>, VarName}],
 2101:            children = [#xmlel{name = <<"value">>,
 2102:                               children = [#xmlcdata{content = VarValue}]}]}.
 2103: 
 2104: form_bool_field(Name, true) ->
 2105:     form_field(Name, <<"true">>);
 2106: form_bool_field(Name, _) ->
 2107:     undefined.
 2108: 
 2109: 
 2110: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2111:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2112:        name = <<"query">>,
 2113:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 2114:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 2115:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 2116:        children = skip_undefined([
 2117:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 2118:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 2119:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 2120:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 2121:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 2122:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 2123:     }]).
 2124: 
 2125: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 2126:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 2127: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 2128:     [].
 2129: 
 2130: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 2131:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 2132: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 2133:     [].
 2134: 
 2135: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 2136:     [];
 2137: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 2138:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 2139:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 2140:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 2141:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 2142:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 2143: 
 2144: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 2145:     undefined;
 2146: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 2147:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 2148:            children = skip_undefined([
 2149:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 2150:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 2151:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 2152: 
 2153: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 2154: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 2155: 
 2156: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 2157:     undefined;
 2158: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 2159:     #xmlel{
 2160:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 2161:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 2162: 
 2163: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 2164:     undefined;
 2165: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 2166:     #xmlel{
 2167:         name = <<"index">>,
 2168:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 2169: 
 2170: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 2171:     undefined;
 2172: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 2173:     #xmlel{
 2174:         name = <<"max">>,
 2175:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 2176: 
 2177: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 2178:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 2179:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 2180:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 2181:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 2182: 
 2183: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 2184:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2185:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2186:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 2187: 
 2188: assert_not_stored(Archived, Sent) ->
 2189:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2190:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2191:     ?assert_equal(0, erlang:length(Same)).
 2192: 
 2193: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 2194:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 2195:     A =:= Raw.
 2196: 
 2197: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2198: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 2199: 
 2200: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs) ->
 2201:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2202:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 2203:     NeverEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2204:                       children = encode_jids(NeverJIDs)},
 2205:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2206:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2207:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2208:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 2209:        children = [AlwaysEl, NeverEl]
 2210:     }]).
 2211: 
 2212: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 2213:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2214:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2215:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2216:     }]).
 2217: 
 2218: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 2219: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 2220:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 2221: 
 2222: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 2223:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 2224: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 2225:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 2226:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 2227: 
 2228: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2229: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 2230: 
 2231: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2232:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2233:     M = #forwarded_message{
 2234:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2235:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 2236:         has_x_user_element = false},
 2237:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 2238: 
 2239: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 2240:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 2241:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 2242:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2243:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 2244:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2245:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 2246: 
 2247: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 2248:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 2249:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 2250: 
 2251: 
 2252: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 2253:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 2254:     M#forwarded_message{
 2255:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2256:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 2257: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2258:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 2259:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 2260:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2261:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 2262:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2263:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 2264:                 M1, Children).
 2265: 
 2266: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 2267:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 2268:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 2269: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
 2270:         attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 2271:     IsUser = lists:member({<<"xmlns">>, <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc#user">>}, Attrs),
 2272:     M#forwarded_message{has_x_user_element = IsUser};
 2273: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 2274: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 2275:     M.
 2276: 
 2277: %% Num is 1-based.
 2278: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 2279:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 2280:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 2281:     Id.
 2282: 
 2283: 
 2284: %% @doc Result query iq.
 2285: %%
 2286: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2287: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2288: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2289: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 2290: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2291: %%     []}]
 2292: %%
 2293: %%
 2294: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2295: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2296: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2297: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 2298: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2299: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 2300: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 2301: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 2302: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 2303: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 2304: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 2305: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 2306: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 2307: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 2308: parse_result_iq(P, Result) ->
 2309:     case get_prop(result_format, P) of
 2310:         mess_fin ->
 2311:             parse_fin_and_iq(Result);
 2312:         iq_query ->
 2313:             parse_legacy_iq(respond_iq(Result));
 2314:         iq_fin ->
 2315:             parse_fin_iq(Result)
 2316:     end.
 2317: 
 2318: %% MAM v0.3
 2319: parse_fin_and_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=FinMsg}) ->
 2320:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(FinMsg, <<"fin">>),
 2321:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2322:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set).
 2323: 
 2324: %% MAM v0.4
 2325: parse_fin_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=undefined}) ->
 2326:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"fin">>),
 2327:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2328:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set).
 2329: 
 2330: %% MAM v0.2
 2331: parse_legacy_iq(IQ) ->
 2332:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"query">>),
 2333:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2334:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set).
 2335: 
 2336: parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set) ->
 2337:     #result_iq{
 2338:         from        = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"from">>),
 2339:         to          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"to">>),
 2340:         id          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"id">>),
 2341:         first       = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, cdata]),
 2342:         first_index = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, {attr, <<"index">>}])),
 2343:         last        = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"last">>}, cdata]),
 2344:         count       = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"count">>}, cdata]))}.
 2345: 
 2346: 
 2347: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 2348: 
 2349: 
 2350: 
 2351: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 2352:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 2353:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2354: 
 2355: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 2356:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 2357:                            IQ) ->
 2358:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 2359:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 2360:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 2361: 
 2362: 
 2363: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2364:                                         children = Children},
 2365:                                  IQ) ->
 2366:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 2367: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2368:                                         children = Children},
 2369:                                  IQ) ->
 2370:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 2371: 
 2372: 
 2373: parse_jids(Els) ->
 2374:     [escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(JID) %% MongooseIM normalizes JIDs
 2375:      || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 2376: 
 2377: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 2378: %%   <error type='modify'>
 2379: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 2380: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 2381: %%   </error>
 2382: %% </iq>
 2383: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 2384:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2385: 
 2386:     IQ = #error_iq{
 2387:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 2388:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2389:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2390: 
 2391: 
 2392: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 2393:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 2394:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 2395:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2396:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 2397: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 2398:     IQ.
 2399: 
 2400: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 2401:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 2402:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 2403: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 2404:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 2405: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 2406:     IQ.
 2407: 
 2408: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2409: %% Helpers (muc)
 2410: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2411: 
 2412: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 2413:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 2414:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 2415:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 2416:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 2417:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 2418: 
 2419: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 2420:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 2421:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2422:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2423:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2424:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}, {anonymous, false}]).
 2425: 
 2426: start_alice_private_room(Config) ->
 2427:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2428:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2429:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2430:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick,
 2431:                [{persistent, true},
 2432:                 {password_protected, true},
 2433:                 {password, <<"secret">>}]).
 2434: 
 2435: start_alice_anonymous_room(Config) ->
 2436:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2437:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2438:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2439:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{anonymous, true}]).
 2440: 
 2441: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 2442:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 2443:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 2444:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 2445:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 2446: 
 2447: destroy_room(Config) ->
 2448:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 2449:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 2450:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 2451:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 2452:         _ -> ok
 2453:     end.
 2454: 
 2455: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 2456:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 2457:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 2458:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 2459:                    Room, Nick).
 2460: 
 2461: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 2462:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 2463: 
 2464: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 2465:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 2466: 
 2467: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 2468:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 2469: 
 2470: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 2471:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 2472: 
 2473: 
 2474: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2475:     Pid = self(),
 2476:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2477:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2478:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2479:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2480:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2481:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2482: 
 2483:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2484:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2485: 
 2486:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2487:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2488:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2489:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2490:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2491:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2492:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2493: 
 2494:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2495: 
 2496:         %% Get whole history.
 2497:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2498:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2499:         AllMessages =
 2500:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2501:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2502:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2503:         ok
 2504:         end,
 2505:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2506:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2507:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2508:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2509: 
 2510:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2511:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2512: 
 2513: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2514:     Pid = self(),
 2515:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2516:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2517:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2518:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2519:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2520:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2521:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2522:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2523:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2524:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2525:         %% Get whole history.
 2526:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_messages">>)),
 2527:         AllMessages =
 2528:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2529:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2530:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2531:         ok
 2532:         end,
 2533:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2534:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2535:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2536:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2537: 
 2538:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2539:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2540: 
 2541: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2542:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2543: 
 2544: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2545:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2546:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2547: 
 2548: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2549:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2550:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2551:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2552:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2553:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2554:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U, 10) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2555:     Config.
 2556: 
 2557: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2558:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2559:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2560:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2561:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room, 10),
 2562:     Config.
 2563: 
 2564: serv_users(Config) ->
 2565:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2566:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2567: 
 2568: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2569:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2570:     {Server, Username}.
 2571: 
 2572: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2573: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) when is_integer(RetryTimes) -> 
 2574:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2575:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2576:        0 -> ok;
 2577:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2578:     end.
 2579: 
 2580: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2581:     archive_size(Server, Username);
 2582: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2583:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2584:         ExpectedSize ->
 2585:             ExpectedSize;
 2586:         _ActualSize ->
 2587:             %% Wait and retry
 2588:             timer:sleep(100),
 2589:             wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2590:     end.
 2591: 
 2592: wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) ->
 2593:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) of
 2594:         ExpectedSize -> ok;
 2595:         ActualSize ->
 2596:             ct:pal("issue=wait_for_archive_size_or_warning, expected_size=~p, actual_size=~p",
 2597:                    [ExpectedSize, ActualSize])
 2598:     end.
 2599: 
 2600: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2601: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) ->
 2602:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2603:     case wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2604:        0 -> ok;
 2605:        X -> ct:fail({room_not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2606:     end.
 2607: 
 2608: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2609:     room_archive_size(Server, Username);
 2610: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2611:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2612:         ExpectedSize ->
 2613:             ExpectedSize;
 2614:         _ActualSize ->
 2615:             %% Wait and retry
 2616:             timer:sleep(100),
 2617:             wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2618:     end.
 2619: 
 2620: 
 2621: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2622:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2623: 
 2624: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2625:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2626: 
 2627: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2628:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2629: 
 2630: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2631:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2632: 
 2633: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2634:     %% Do not care
 2635:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2636:     ok.
 2637: 
 2638: wait_message_range(P, Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2639:     wait_message_range(P, Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2640: 
 2641: wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2642:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Client),
 2643:     Messages = respond_messages(Result),
 2644:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2645:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2646:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2647:     try
 2648:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2649:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2650:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2651:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2652:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2653:         ok
 2654:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2655:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2656:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2657:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2658:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2659:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2660:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2661:     end.
 2662: 
 2663: 
 2664: wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2665:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 2666:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2667:     ?assert_equal([], respond_messages(Result)),
 2668:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2669:     try
 2670:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2671:         ok
 2672:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2673:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2674:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2675:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2676:     end.
 2677: 
 2678: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2679:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2680:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2681:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2682:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2683:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2684:     end.
 2685: 
 2686: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2687:     random:seed(now()),
 2688:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2689:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2690:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2691:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2692:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2693:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2694:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2695:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2696:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2697:     AllUsers = [{Domain, <<"alice">>}, {Domain, <<"bob">>}, {Domain, <<"carol">>}],
 2698:     wait_for_msgs(Msgs, AllUsers),
 2699: 
 2700:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2701: 
 2702: %% Wait for messages to be written
 2703: wait_for_msgs(Msgs, Users) ->
 2704:     UsersCnt = [{S, U, count_msgs(Msgs, S, U)} || {S, U} <- Users],
 2705:     [wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(S, U, 10, C) || {S, U, C} <- UsersCnt],
 2706:     ok.
 2707: 
 2708: count_msgs(Msgs, S, U) ->
 2709:     Bin = <<U/binary, "@", S/binary>>,
 2710:     length([1 ||
 2711:             {_,
 2712:              {FromBin, _FromJID, _FromArcID},
 2713:              {ToBin, _ToJID, _ToArcID}, _, _Packet} <- Msgs,
 2714:            FromBin =:= Bin orelse ToBin =:= Bin]).
 2715: 
 2716: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2717:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2718:         ID1 =< ID2
 2719:     end,
 2720:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2721: 
 2722: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2723:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2724:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2725:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2726:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2727:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2728: 
 2729: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2730:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2731: 
 2732:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2733:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2734: 
 2735: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2736:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2737:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2738:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2739:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2740:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2741:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2742:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2743: 
 2744: random_time() ->
 2745:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2746:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2747:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2748: 
 2749: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2750:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2751:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2752:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2753:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2754: 
 2755: 
 2756: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2757:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2758: 
 2759: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2760:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2761:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2762:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2763:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2764:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2765:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2766: 
 2767: archive_message(Args) ->
 2768:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2769: 
 2770: 
 2771: 
 2772: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2773:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2774: 
 2775:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2776:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2777:     R = room_address(Room),
 2778: 
 2779:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2780:     Host = host(),
 2781:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2782:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2783:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2784:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2785:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2786:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2787:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2788:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2789: 
 2790:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2791: 
 2792:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2793: 
 2794:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2795: 
 2796: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2797:     Host = host(),
 2798:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2799: 
 2800: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2801:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2802:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2803:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2804:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2805: 
 2806: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2807: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2808:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2809:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2810: 
 2811: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2812:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2813: 
 2814: 
 2815: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2816:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2817: 
 2818: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2819:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2820:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2821:         Other ->
 2822:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2823:             false
 2824:     end.
 2825: 
 2826: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2827:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2828:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2829:             true;
 2830:         _ ->
 2831:             false
 2832:     end.
 2833: 
 2834: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2835:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2836: 
 2837: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2838:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2839:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2840:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2841:     Client.
 2842: 
 2843: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2844:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2845:         undefined ->
 2846:             ok;
 2847:         Value ->
 2848:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2849:     end.
 2850: 
 2851: 
 2852: %% Bob and Alice are friends.
 2853: %% Kate and Alice are not friends.
 2854: %%
 2855: %% Messages:
 2856: %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2857: %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2858: %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2859: %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2860: %%
 2861: %% Each tuple is
 2862: %% {{Default, Always, Never},
 2863: %%  [Message1Archived, Message2Archived, Message3Archied, Message4Archived]}
 2864: prefs_cases2() ->
 2865:     [
 2866:      {{roster, [], []},              [true, true, false, false]},
 2867:      {{roster, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2868:      {{roster, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2869:      {{roster, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2870:  
 2871:      {{roster, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2872:      {{roster, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2873:      {{roster, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2874:  
 2875:  
 2876:      {{never, [], []},              [false, false, false, false]},
 2877:      {{never, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2878:      {{never, [kate], []},          [false, false, true, true]},
 2879:      {{never, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2880:  
 2881:      {{never, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2882:      {{never, [], [kate]},          [false, false, false, false]},
 2883:      {{never, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2884:  
 2885:  
 2886:      {{always, [], []},              [true, true, true, true]},
 2887:      {{always, [bob], []},           [true, true, true, true]},
 2888:      {{always, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2889:      {{always, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2890:  
 2891:      {{always, [], [bob]},           [false, false, true, true]},
 2892:      {{always, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2893:      {{always, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]}
 2894:     ].
 2895: 
 2896: %% First write all messages, than read and check
 2897: run_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2898:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2899:     F = fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2900:         make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob),
 2901:         %% Just send messages for each prefs configuration
 2902:         Funs = [run_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()],
 2903: 
 2904:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2905: 
 2906:         %% Get ALL messages using several queries if required
 2907:         Stanzas = get_all_messages(P, Alice),
 2908:         ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Stanzas),
 2909:         Bodies = [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages],
 2910: 
 2911:         %% Check messages, print out all failed cases
 2912:         Fails = lists:append([Fun(Bodies) || Fun <- Funs]),
 2913:         %% If fails consult with ct:pal/2 why
 2914:         ?assert_equal([], Fails)
 2915:         end,
 2916:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], F).
 2917: 
 2918: make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob) ->
 2919:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2920:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set
 2921:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % presence subscribe
 2922: 
 2923:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2924:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3, 5000), % iq set, presence subscribed, presence
 2925:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2926: 
 2927:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2928:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000), % iq set subscription=to, presence subscribe
 2929:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2930: 
 2931:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2932:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=both
 2933:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3, 5000), % iq set subscription=both, presence subscribed, presence
 2934:         ok.
 2935: 
 2936: run_prefs_case({PrefsState, ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) ->
 2937:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2938:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2939:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2940:     Messages = [iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("n=~p, prefs=~p, now=~p",
 2941:                                                [N, PrefsState, now()]))
 2942:                 || N <- [1,2,3,4]],
 2943:     %% Messages:
 2944:     %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2945:     %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2946:     %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2947:     %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2948:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(1, Messages))),
 2949:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, lists:nth(2, Messages))),
 2950:     escalus:send(Kate, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(3, Messages))),
 2951:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Kate, lists:nth(4, Messages))),
 2952:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000),
 2953:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 1, 5000),
 2954:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000),
 2955:     %% Delay check
 2956:     fun(Bodies) ->
 2957:         ActualMessageStates = [lists:member(M, Bodies) || M <- Messages],
 2958:         ?_assert_equal_extra(ExpectedMessageStates, ActualMessageStates,
 2959:                              [{prefs_state, PrefsState}])
 2960:     end.
 2961: 
 2962: get_last_four_messages(P, Alice) ->
 2963:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=4, direction='before'},
 2964:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last4_rsm">>, RSM)),
 2965:     respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)).
 2966: 
 2967: get_all_messages(P, Alice) ->
 2968:     get_all_messages(P, Alice, undefined).
 2969: 
 2970: get_all_messages(P, Alice, Id) ->
 2971:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=50, direction='after', id=Id},
 2972:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"page_rsm">>, RSM)),
 2973:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 2974:     PageMessages = respond_messages(Result),
 2975:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2976:     #result_iq{last=LastId} = ParsedIQ,
 2977:     case PageMessages of
 2978:         [] ->
 2979:             [];
 2980:         [_|_] ->
 2981:             PageMessages ++ get_all_messages(P, Alice, LastId)
 2982:     end.
 2983: 
 2984: stanza_prefs_set_request({DefaultMode, AlwaysUsers, NeverUsers}, Config) ->
 2985:     DefaultModeBin = atom_to_binary(DefaultMode, utf8),
 2986:     AlwaysJIDs = users_to_jids(AlwaysUsers, Config),
 2987:     NeverJIDs  = users_to_jids(NeverUsers, Config),
 2988:     stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultModeBin, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs).
 2989: 
 2990: users_to_jids(Users, Config) ->
 2991:     [escalus_users:get_jid(Config, User) || User <- Users].
 2992: 
 2993: print_configuration_not_supported(C, B) ->
 2994:     I = io_lib:format("issue=configuration_not_supported, "
 2995:                        "configuration=~p, basic_group=~p", [C, B]),
 2996:      binary_to_list(iolist_to_binary(I)).
 2997: 
 2998: %% The same as prefs_set_request case but for different configurations
 2999: run_set_and_get_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 3000:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 3001:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 3002:         [run_set_and_get_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()]
 3003:         end,
 3004:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 3005: 
 3006: %% Alice sets and gets her preferences
 3007: run_set_and_get_prefs_case({PrefsState, _ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Config) ->
 3008:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 3009:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 3010:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 3011: 
 3012:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 3013:     ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 3014: 
 3015:     ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 3016:     ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 3017:     ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 3018:     ok.
 3019: 
 3020: maybe_binary_to_integer(B) when is_binary(B) ->
 3021:     list_to_integer(binary_to_list(B));
 3022: maybe_binary_to_integer(undefined) ->
 3023:     undefined.
 3024: 
 3025: add_nostore_hint(#xmlel{children=Children}=Elem) ->
 3026:     Elem#xmlel{children=Children ++ [nostore_hint_elem()]}.
 3027: 
 3028: nostore_hint_elem() ->
 3029:     #xmlel{name = <<"no-store">>, attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:hints">>}]}.
 3030: 
 3031: has_x_user_element(ArcMsg) ->
 3032:     ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 3033:     ParsedMess#forwarded_message.has_x_user_element.
